tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_test_results (
    test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    subject_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    design_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE subject_lines (
    subject_line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    subject_line_text TEXT,
    is_tested BOOL,
    test_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE email_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    email_title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    design_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT,
    subject_line_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    design_id INT,
    test_date TIMESTAMP,
    performance_metrics TEXT
);
